content:
No need to apologize! I'm happy to start fresh and chat with you about your dinner plans.

For the roasted veggies, you can't go wrong with some classic choices like Brussels sprouts, broccoli, carrots, or asparagus. If you want to mix things up, you could try roasting some sweet potatoes, cauliflower, or parsnips. The key is to choose veggies that roast well and complement the flavor of the grilled chicken.

As for seasonings and herbs, you could keep it simple with some olive oil, salt, and pepper. Or, you could add some dried or fresh herbs like thyme, rosemary, or parsley to give your veggies a bit more flavor. If you want to add some extra depth, you could try using some garlic powder, paprika, or lemon zest.

What do you think? Do any of these options sound appealing to you, or do you have something else in mind?
